structure.unit: Proprietors Of Wharves, Real Estate Lying In Common, And General Fields

law.catch_line: Issuance Of Warrant For Meeting Upon Application Of Proprietors Of Lands, Wharves Or Other Real Estate Held In Common To Organize As Corporation
law.text: Upon written application of five or more proprietors of lands, wharves or other real estate held in common to a justice of the peace, stating that they intend to organize themselves as a corporation, he shall issue his warrant to one of the applicants, directing him to call a meeting of all the proprietors and expressing in the warrant the time, place, occasion and purpose of the meeting.
